snippet: With the exception of that odd Clint Eastwood interlude, the war in Afghanistan and the U.S. troops fighting there were barely mentioned onstage at the Republican convention - and not at all in Mitt Romney's acceptance speech. Will the Democrats,...
abstract: With the exception of that odd Clint Eastwood interlude, the war in Afghanistan and the U.S. troops fighting there were barely mentioned onstage at the Republican convention - and not at all in Mitt Romney's acceptance speech. Will the Democrats, perhaps sensing an opening, make the war more of an issue at their convention this week?

headline.main: Campaign References to Afghanistan Are Missing In Action

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
